error.confirm.account: you must confirmed your account with the email that you received
error.rule.password: %s should contain at least one digit, one lower case, one upper case and at least 8 characters
error.rule.username: %s should contain only letter, digit, _ or - and between 3 to 6 characters
mail.changeEmail.body: Click on the button below to modify your email address
mail.changeEmail.subject: website - email address modification
mail.changeEmail.title: Email address modification
mail.confirmUser.body: Click on the button below to confirm your account
mail.confirmUser.subject: website - account confirmation
mail.confirmUser.title: Account confirmation
mail.resetPassword.body: Click on the button below to reset your password
mail.resetPassword.subject: website - reset password
mail.resetPassword.title: Reset password
success.mail.changeEmail: an email to change your email address has been sent to this new address
success.mail.confirmUser: an email to confirm your account has been sent
success.mail.resetPassword: an email to reset your password has been sent
